description:
Bar is a low-level component to be used in XYPlot-type charts (namely BarChart).
It is specified in terms of a range (min & max) of values on one axis and a
single value on the other axis.
Passing props `x`, `xEnd` and `y` specifies a horizontal bar, centered on `y`
and spanning from `x` to `xEnd`.
Passing props `x`, `y`, and `yEnd' specifies a vertical bar, centered on `x`
and spanning from `y` to `yEnd`.

x.description:
For a vertical bar, `x` represents the X data value on which the bar is centered.
For a horizontal bar, `x` represents the *starting* X value of the bar, ie. the minimum of the range it spans

y.description:
For a horizontal bar, `y` represents the Y data value on which the bar is centered.
For a vertical bar, `y` represents the *starting* Y value of the bar, ie. the minimum of the range it spans

xEnd.description:
For a horizontal bar, `xEnd` represents the *ending* X data value of the bar, ie. the maximum of the range it spans.
This prop should not be defined if the bar is vertical.

yEnd.description:
For a vertical bar, `yEnd` represents the *ending* Y data value of the bar, ie. the maximum of the range it spans.
This prop should not be defined if the bar is horizontal.

thickness.description: The thickness of the bar, in pixels. (width of vertical bar, or height of horizontal bar).

className.description: Class name(s) to be included on the bar's <rect> element.

style.description: Inline style object to be included on the bar's <rect> element.

onMouseMove.description: `mousemove` event handler callback, called when user's mouse moves within the bar.

onMouseEnter.description: `mouseenter` event handler callback, called when user's mouse enters the bar.

onMouseLeave.description: `mouseleave` event handler callback, called when user's mouse leaves the bar.

xScale.description: D3 scale for X axis - provided by XYPlot.

yScale.description: D3 scale for Y axis - provided by XYPlot.

showLabel.description: Conditional if column should display values above/beside bar.

labelFormat.description: Format to use for the values or accessor that returns the updated value.

labelDistance.description: The distance from the column the label appears in pixels.

labelClassName.description: Class name(s) to be included on the bar's <text> element.
